text: Na'ankure tamagra amanage hutma nehaze, tagra fri'zane huvempa nehuta, fri vahe kuma'ene keaga huhagerafi'none nehaze. Hagi henka knazama esania knazamo'a, tavakora osugahie. Na'ankure tagrama havigema nehuna kemo, tagu'vazina manigahune nehuta, vahe'ma rezmavatgama nehuna zamo frakirantegahie huta nehaze.
